rent_a_car: RENT A CAR IN THE NETHERLANDS
book_directly_from: Book Directly from local suppliers. No commission, No mark-ups
elevate_your_travel_experience: Elevate your travel experience by renting one of our premium cars. Choose one of the following categories to match your exact desire.
view_our_wide_options: View our wide options of rental cars. ideal for every occasion and with all possible options.
car_from_top_brands: RENT A CAR FROM TOP BRANDS
we_focus_on_renting: We focus on renting out cars from the best possible brands that stand for reliability, safety, and quality.
view_our_wide_range: View our wide range of rental cars. Sort by brand, category, or price.
fill_in_all_necessary_data: Fill in all the necessary data and register the car. Make sure you fill in all information truthfully.
pay_calculated_rent: Pay the calculated rent with one of our secure payment methods.
car_prepared_in_perfect_condition: The car will be prepared for you in perfect condition so that you can get on the road immediately.
experience_description: With more than 10 years of experience, we know exactly what our clients expect when renting a car. We have always strived to offer solely the best possible quality at the best-offered prices. We do this by connecting our customers directly with local car rentals to avoid any additional costs. With more than 10,000 satisfied customers, you can be sure that we are the right choice.
experience_footer: We have always strived to offer solely the best possible quality at the best-offered prices.
copyright_notice: All Copyrights reserved by Now2Rent Â© :date
featured_subscriptions_desc: With featured spotlight, your car will be shown on the homepage as recommended, and at the top of the entire catalog. Even when, for example, you rent out a SUV and the SUV category is clicked, your car will immediately be at the top.
VIC_desc: Do you want to be more visible on our platform and succeed more in your goals? These are promotions that are placed with a GIF banner featuring your cars, logo, text, and a book now button. This banner is shown everywhere on our website and ensures that you are seen and booked even more.
receive_verified_badge: With each package, you receive the verified badge.
three_month_package: Upon purchasing our 3-month package, you will receive our featured spotlight package for free for your entire offer for 7 days, and the premium badge.
six_month_package: Upon purchasing our 6-month package, you will receive our featured spotlight 14-day package for free, along with the premium and verified badges.
twelve_month_package: Upon purchasing our 12-month package, you will receive our featured spotlight package for 1 month, 2 weeks special VIC package, along with the premium and verified badges.
subscriptions_auto_stop: All of our subscriptions are automatically stopped after the subscription period, unless you choose to extend so you will not be stuck to anything!
note: NOTE: All prices are exclusive of 21% VAT.
choose_trustworthy_car_rental: CHOOSE FOR A CAR RENTAL COMPANY THAT YOU CAN TRUST
initiate_consultation: Kindly provide all necessary details to initiate a consultation for our services. Your information will enable us to better understand your requirements and offer customized solutions.
subject: SUBJECT
subscription_confirmation_text: After clicking proceed, you will be redirected to payment page.
faq_text: These are some Frequently asked question by our users.
faq_q1: Can I get this car delivered?
faq_a1: Every company offers delivery upon request to your location (view fast delivery locations) within Europe. However, free pick-up from their branch is available during office hours.
faq_a2: Book this car directly via the Now2Rent Car Rental App or now2rent.com. Pay zero commission and zero booking fees! Choose among thousands of cars in 35+ cities across the world.
no_search_result_msg: Sorry! We could not find any results against your search criteria.
